rule.name: BrainMethod (static values)
rule.description: Brain Methods tend to centralize the functionality of a class, in the same way as a God Class centralizes the functionality of an entire subsystem, or sometimes even a whole system.
rule.message:
Potential occurrence of Brain Method anomaly found. This anomaly occurs when:
Method is excessively large
Method has many conditional branches
Method has deep nesting level
Method uses many variables
